humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the sentinel lymph node was negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/1). Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that sentinel lymph node #1 from the left axilla was negative for tumor cells (0/1). This suggests that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The substaging information, such as N0a, N0b, or N0(i+), is not provided in the report.
